title: Can i return a  gift?
body:
This person has gifted me which is nice of them, but i don't that person to do it without me being able to give anything back. Is there a way i can give the gift back and return the rp to them?

My ign: FloweyTheFlower

replies.body:
With the way the system currently works, you can't issue a refund on a gift that you were sent. 

However! I saw that you haven't used the Meowkai skin you were sent yet. Go ahead and hit up our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), explain the situation that your conscience just won't let you accept this gift right now, and I'm sure we can get that taken care of ^_^!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=9T0FyAoh,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-21T04:19:53.320+0000)
>
> With the way the system currently works, you can't issue a refund on a gift that you were sent. 
> 
> However! I saw that you haven't used the Meowkai skin you were sent yet. Go ahead and hit up our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), explain the situation that your conscience just won't let you accept this gift right now, and I'm sure we can get that taken care of ^_^!

thanks ^-^
